concept.title: Diversity Edu
concept.shortdesc: Diversity Edu is a research based, online course for students. The course is aimed to educate students and equip them with necessary skills to combat diversity and recognize biases and stereotypes within themselves and their community.

conbody.p: Topics introduced in Diversity Edu include:

ul.li: Understanding the effects of stereotypical thinking
Focusing on the impact of language and behavior choices
